newsitem.title: EGYPT: Egypt pound overnight, one week rates up.
newsitem.headline: Egypt pound overnight, one week rates up.

text.p: Egyptian pound overnight and one week interbank rates rose on Wednesday in a slightly short private sector market, bankers said.
Overnight rates were between 10-3/16 and 10-1/4 against Monday's 10-1/8 percent.
The market was closed on Tuesday.
Bankers said one week rates went up to 10-1/4 and 10-5/16 from 10-1/8 on Monday.
State-owned banks maintained their minimum overnight lending rate at 10-1/2 percent, bankers said.
